name: Julius S. BARATI, President, Wilson Farm Builders, Inc., Appellant, v. Ann L. BARATI, Appellee

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: Julius S. BARATI, President, Wilson Farm Builders, Inc., Appellant, v. Ann L. BARATI, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Julius S. Barati, I. P. P., for appellant.
Ronald J. Búa, J. Kerrington Lewis, P. Andrew Diamond, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
382 A.2d 739
Julius S. BARATI, President, Wilson Farm Builders, Inc., Appellant, v. Ann L. BARATI, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 10, 1978.
Decided Feb. 10, 1978.
Julius S. Barati, I. P. P., for appellant.
Ronald J. Búa, J. Kerrington Lewis, P. Andrew Diamond, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
